description:
pondNotes from smallPondapps is your Simplenote client for webOS - a great place to keep your notes, lists, ideas and more. Note taking is fast & easy with pondNotes and JustType support lets you take notes on the fly. Organize your notes with tags or search through your notes with ease to find that bit of information you need in a hurry.

pondNotes syncs with Simplenote so you can access your notes from practically anywhere. In addition to the Simplenote web service, Simplenote clients exist for Windows, iOS, Android, Blackberry and most other platforms. You'll need a free Simplenote account to sync your notes. pondNotes lets you create and access your notes while offline, then sync to Simplenote when you have a data connection.

Please use the in-app support options to let us know if you have any problems and we'll fix them immediately. Note also that we cannot respond to reviews in the catalog - contact us directly at bigfish@smallpondapps.com with any support issues.
